movies.title: Eternity
movies.review: As an indecisive person that is for sure The Bad Place. Very sweet, lots of laughs and stunning colour grading. Absolutely loved Da'Vine Joy Randolph. Lost a star because of its predictable storyline but I had a good time nevertheless.
